ygData.subject: Re: A newbie SK has A few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You are ok in any part of freeport except north freeport.  I don t know about the boat trip though. Tekman
ygData.messageBody:
--- Don Bickner <bick@...> wrote:
> Hello all,
> I have just created a DE SK and have a few
> questions.
>
> 1) Is there any place near freeport that i can
> buy food? I have found the Swashbuckler that will
> buy my loot but he sells no food.I find it degrading
> to ask the freeport residents to buy food and water
> for me.
>
> 2) What is the method of getting on the boat and
> over to faydwer? I have spent all my leveling
> Killing orc pawns in the commons so All the guards
> that I can see at the gates will con me dubiously,
> but I have been afraid to enter(I am only level 5).
> Will all the guards in FP area regard me dubiously?
> And if I do make it over to BB, how do I elude the
> guards over near the docks of BB?
>
> Thank you
>
You are ok in any part of freeport except north
freeport. I don't know about the boat trip though.

Tekman
